scenes.title: Scene 1: Legacy of the Ranch
scenes.description: A discussion about bringing a ranch-type property back to life through the process of micro-propagation.

scenes.title: Scene 2: The Journey Home
scenes.description: The cuttings are transported overnight back to Kotlisch, Michigan for propagation.

scenes.title: Scene 3: Successful Propagation
scenes.description: Micro-propagation is successfully performed on the cuttings.

Chapter 2: The Archangel Tree Archive He.title: Chapter 2: The Archangel Tree Archive Headquarters

scenes.title: Scene 1: A Snowy Encounter
scenes.description: Jake Milarch is seen walking through a snow-covered landscape towards the Archangel Tree Archive Headquarters.

scenes.title: Scene 2: Indoor Growth
scenes.description: Indoor shelves with labelled 'Redwoods' and 'Sequoia' indicate a controlled environment for sapling growth.

scenes.title: Scene 3: Delving into Micropropagation
scenes.description: A detailed explanation of the lab's main goals focusing on research, development, and the process to exponentially multiply small cuttings.

scenes.title: Scene 4: The Replication Process
scenes.description: The procedure of taking small cuttings, treating them with hormones, and the use of jars in the reproduction process to grow a substantial number of trees.
